com.facebook.buck.distributed.build_slave

Class MinionHealthTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.distributed.build_slave.MinionHealthTracker

  • public class MinionHealthTracker
extends Object
    Tracks the health of Minions to make sure they don't silently die and the build hangs.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MinionHealthTracker.MinionHealthStatus
      Contains details about status of all minions that have taken part in the build
      static class  MinionHealthTracker.MinionTrackingInfo
      Contains health check details for a single minion

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MinionHealthTracker(Clock clock, long maxMinionSilenceMillis, int maxConsecutiveSlowDeadMinionChecks, long expectedHeartbeatIntervalMillis, long slowHeartbeatWarningThresholdMillis, HealthCheckStatsTracker healthCheckStatsTracker) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MinionHealthTracker.MinionHealthStatus checkMinionHealth()
      Returns all minions that are currently thought to be dead/not-healthy.
      void reportMinionAlive(String minionId, String runId)
      Heartbeat reports a minion is currently alive and happily running.
      void stopTrackingForever(String minionId)
      Tell the tracker it is fine to forever stop tracking this minion.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • reportMinionAlive

        public void reportMinionAlive(String minionId,
                              String runId)
        Heartbeat reports a minion is currently alive and happily running.

      • checkMinionHealth

        public MinionHealthTracker.MinionHealthStatus checkMinionHealth()
        Returns all minions that are currently thought to be dead/not-healthy.

      • stopTrackingForever

        public void stopTrackingForever(String minionId)
        Tell the tracker it is fine to forever stop tracking this minion. This class is thread-safe.
